original_text: We are not like Moses. His face did not continue to be bright with the light from God. So he covered his face with a cloth. He did not want the Israelite people to see that the light was coming to an end.
korean_text: 우리는 모세가 이스라엘 자손들에게 장차 없어질 것의 결국을 주목하지 못하게 하려고 수건을 그 얼굴에 쓴 것 같이 아니하노라

sentences.original_text: His face did not continue to be bright
So he covered his face with a cloth
He did not want the Israelite people to see
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 백성이 보기를 원치 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: that the light was coming to an end
